entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Carmacks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:32 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.2°C

Observed at: Carmacks 7:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

Humidity: 79 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
